title: [K-12] Mobile Microlearning Course Based on Foreign Literature Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and no literary analysis experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous discussion activities using digital devices combined with twice-weekly live video sessions

learning_goals: Learners can enhance critical reading skills considering cultural contexts by analyzing three American short stories.

Learners will create and deliver five-minute presentations using at least three logical bases (statistics, case studies, expert opinions) in discussion-based learning activities held twice weekly over 2â€“4 weeks

Learners will analyze at least three literary works in mock trial and debate activities, identify two or more themes per work, and deliver presentations meeting at least four of five team debate checklist items (evidence presentation, counterargument construction, time management)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
